title: BBSpot quizzes
body: <p><a href="http://www.bbspot.com/News/2004/10/extension_quiz.php" title="You are .html You are versatile and improving, but you do have your limits.  When you work with amateurs it can get quite ugly."><img src="http://www.bbspot.com/Images/News_Features/2004/10/file_extensions/html.jpg" width="300" height="90" border="0" alt="You are .html You are versatile and improving, but you do have your limits.  When you work with amateurs it can get quite ugly." /></a><br /><a href="http://www.bbspot.com/News/2004/10/extension_quiz.php" title="Which File Extension are You?">Which File Extension are You?</a></p><p>...and:<br /><a href="http://bbspot.com/News/2003/01/os_quiz.php" title="You are Amiga OS. Ahead of your time.  You keep a lot of balls in the air.  If only your parents had given you more opportunities to suceed."><img src="http://www.bbspot.com/Images/News_Features/2003/01/os_quiz/amiga.jpg" width="300" height="90" border="0" alt="You are Amiga OS. Ahead of your time.  You keep a lot of balls in the air.  If only your parents had given you more opportunities to suceed." /></a><br /><a href="http://bbspot.com/News/2003/01/os_quiz.php" title="Which OS are You?">Which OS are You?</a></p><p>...and my favorite:<br /><a href="http://bbspot.com/News/2004/04/nigerian_quiz.php" title="You are Peterson Bolinga. YOU ARE REPRESENTING THE BOARD OF THE CONTRACT AWARD COMMITTEE OF THE ZAMBIAN MINISTRY OF MINING COMMISSION.  YOU HAVE $30,500,000 TO SHARE. YOU SEEK MY ASSISTANCE."><img src="http://www.bbspot.com/Images/News_Features/2004/04/scammer/peterson_bolinga.jpg" width="300" height="90" border="0" alt="You are Peterson Bolinga. YOU ARE REPRESENTING THE BOARD OF THE CONTRACT AWARD COMMITTEE OF THE ZAMBIAN MINISTRY OF MINING COMMISSION.  YOU HAVE $30,500,000 TO SHARE. YOU SEEK MY ASSISTANCE." /></a><br /><a href="http://bbspot.com/News/2004/04/nigerian_quiz.php" title="Which Nigerian spammer are You?">Which Nigerian spammer are You?</a></p>
bodyArticleHtml: You are Amiga OS. Ahead of your time.  You keep a lot of balls in the air.  If only your parents had given you more opportunities to suceed.
You are Amiga OS. Ahead of your time.  You keep a lot of balls in the air.  If only your parents had given you more opportunities to suceed.
